name: Totem (itch) (studiokaboom)
description:
Totem is a 4 player couch co-op puzzle platformer where you and your friends must work together to overcome the rising chaos and save the island from total destruction! 

Features
  • 4 player local co-op multiplayer fun
  • Work with your friends to complete tricky puzzles
  • Variety of colorful characters to play
Controls

Movement

  •  Left Stick

Jump

  • (PS4 Controller) Square button
  • (Xbox One controller) A button

Rotate Player

  • Left shoulder button (Rotate Left)
  • Right shoulder button (Rotate Right)

OR

  • Left trigger (Rotate Left)
  • Right trigger (Rotate Right)
